column4: well I found out how to solve my wireless problems with my linksys wireless pci card.... to not use the linux rt2500 drivers and use the windows wireless driver thing instead
8.04 has been the most problamatic release I've installed in a long while.... especially when it came to wireless internet and video
I just hope to see some updates coming out soon, i have not seen a single one since I upgraded to 8.04, but then again I guess I am being impatient
heh. I hope to see few, that means it's a clean release :)
